title: Can’t transfer easily
text: One of the best features of this app for me was the ability to “add money” from a different Bank account. All of a sudden this function started giving an error that hasn’t been fixed. Big deal if Revolut is trying to make banking easier...

title: Life changer app
text:
I've been using the Revolut app for over a year now, and it's been a game-changer for managing my finances. The user-friendly interface, quick transactions, and various financial features make it a top-notch choice. Cash, Commodities, stocks, crypto all in one place. Am simply amazed. 
Highly recommend!

title: Very Disappointed
text: I’m not that satisfied with this account. I signed up for the account to be able to use for payments abroad. The app allowed me to transfer $50 from another bank and now I am no longer able make real time transaction. The routing and checking account number never worked  so I can’t even transfer money from another bank. Customer service is virtual and they can’t even find a solution for me. On paper it looks like an awesome product in reality it’s not. I wouldn’t not recommend this service to anyone. I’m very disappointed.

title: Slick app, but very immature.
text: Revolut has a great idea, but a lot of growing left to do. I look forward to three years from now when it’s a bit more mature and has figured out how it wants to operate. It does some things very well, but its service can be nightmarish, with multiple staff working out of sync with you at the same time. Do not use this as a primary account for anything - it is probably best done as a cheap and convenient debit card complement to a real bank.

title: Revolutionary
text: On all levels, Revolut has allowed me to freely use my card hassle free, and has allowed me to put my full confidence in it. NOT A DOUBT comes to mind when your swiping, you know it’s always reliable. Well done. Only concern is I cannot seem to connect my card to the App Store, any recommendations???

title: So convenient
text: I live in Gibraltar and go to Spain weekly.  The amount of charges i get from using my Uk bank card is ridiculous so got Resolut which saves on charges.  But will use this when i go to other countries as well.   I have the basic account for now but of i find i use it a lot will switch to premium.   Get this its worth it.

title: Takes forever to set up and they put a hold on your cash
text: Very convoluted to set up and get full access, I transferred money in from an account in minutes, then couldn’t get past “limited access” in order to use the account for anything. They wouldn’t even let me transfer back to the same account! So basically they hold your cash and give you no way to contact them, it just sits there “in review” status. Sent them what they asked for within minutes. It’s been weeks now.

title: Awesome features
text: This app has been my only choice for sending and receiving money internationally. And I love the ability to add funds instantly (yay Apple cash) and for free. It’s fantastic, Will be a customer as long as it stays free! Luckily I have not run into any transfer issues so have never dealt with their customer service.

title: I gotta say
text:
THIS ID THE COOLEST, SMOOTHEST, EASIEST BANK I have ever dealt with!

I don’t usually take time to submit a review, but I have never been more happy with a bank. I have never even needed to call I for 1 single problem. I don’t understand the poor reviews, since I am new , so far , soo good.

Keep Up the great service you are providing & Thank You.

title: Money in purgatory
text: I tried to send several hundred dollars over 2 days to someone who uses Revolut and they restricted my account. I’ve resubmitted my info 3 times so far. They provide little insight into what the problem is exactly. The most recent one just sitting there “under review”. I can’t close the account because there’s money in it and I can’t transfer it out because it’s restricted. They need a better review process. At least let you close your account and send the money back to the source account.

title: App has me locked out
text: I have not been able to log into my account for over 2 weeks I keep getting an “oops something has gone wrong” error and cannot even access my account what is going on with this app I have money in it I need access to, no way to get to talk tot someone over the phone the only customer support they offer is via app which makes zero sense because I unable to even get into the app without the error message constantly popping up, what am I to do here?????!?!!!?!!

title: Run by kids! They can block your account whenever they want and ask the most stupid questions!
text:
Well, well, well. Seems like they are run by kids also some racist kids! They can block your account and ask questions about your family income and when you send them the info they will ask the same question over and over again! 
I smell racism in their dealing with people which don’t think they belong to their race etc.
I’ve been unable to use my own money from my own account for weeks now!!! Disgusting!!!!

title: Problems.
text: I have a STANDARD account. Tried to add $100 and it wouldn’t allow it. Was then able to add two increments of $40 to my Revolut account and then it wouldn’t allow a third. Then it allowed me to add $20. But no other amount beyond that. I haven’t been able to find any information as to why there’s a limit. Do bother with customer service unless you have an upgraded account (monthly payments of $10 or $13, depending). So now I have deposited money, that I cannot use for my intended purpose, in a Revolut account. It shouldn’t be this difficult.

title: Okay
text: Love the idea of the app. It’s pretty cool that you can get a medal card for a fee per month. I know it’s not cheap to make so I get it. I can’t use this card with certain things and I don’t like that. The card registers as a prepaid card so it doesn’t work as an option for a lot of payment methods. Wished this wasn’t the case. Such a premium looking card but unfortunately can’t be used as such.

title: Too many glitches!
text:
I have been using Revolut for years and loving it, but my experience with the app this week has been pretty terrible. 

The app keeps rejecting my debit card top ups for « possible fraud » and customer service was super unhelpful. They suggested I try another method. I linked two banks account, which unlinked themselves 48 hours later. Trying to top up with Apple Pay didn’t work either because I was trying to add too much and wasn’t allowed to. 

Finally I succeeded to add money via ACH. But it’s been 5 days and the transfer is still showing as processing… ACH transfers usually clear within 24 hours with my bank so I don’t understand why Revolut is taking to long. 

Overall super displeased with my experience this week.

title: Formerly great service
text: Now the service, especially the chat function went downhill. Former conversions are not tracked and I had to open for each of my cases again the service tickets. Per incident that took me 3-5 interactions. Some problems got only solved half way, e.g. Revolut keep a foreign exchange fee on 15 CHF and said it was the hotel, which was not true. Very unfortunate, I have the impression that the service employees want to make it easy for themselves and take very little action.

title: Too chatty
text:
I don’t need multiple emails, phone alerts, and watch alerts to remind me I have a way to spend money. 

If I turn off notifications I won’t get valid alerts like an account running low. 

Let me turn off your marketing notifications. You can still stuff them in the app. But don’t buzz my wrist 5 times a day to tell me I have a virtual card. . . I know I have it, I didn’t accidentally install your app, create an account, and verify it.

title: fav bank so far
text: I can do so many things with this bank that I cannot do with others. Pay in any currency, as I travel a lot, no exchange fees. Pay friends with funny GIFs. Have a disposable virtual card for those sites I don’t trust. And bonuses when I refer a friend. This is my bank of choice!

title: Fix glitches and add more customer support
text:
Great in theory. Generally works but there are sometimes glitches (like transaction history doesn’t show up for days, or the top ups don’t go through). Furthermore; this is more concerning since customer support is only available via chat and sometimes the wait for a live agent is hours or days. Way too long for a money app.

Overall, good: just fix glitches and add more support agents.

title: Locked out of app
text: I’ve been trying to verify my ID and was locked out of app. I try to use my phone number for verification and it says it’s invalid. I cant contact support (because it’s only in app support) and my emails have been ignored. I just want access to my account to verify my ID but can’t do this. I’ve tried reinstalling the app and everything. Please help me since I can not access the in-app chat support and I’m desperately trying to access my account. I also tried calling but there is no way to sort this issue via phone or email.

title: Straight up a scam.
text: Wow. I’ve never written a review before in my 12 years of using an iPhone but I am writing one specifically for this app. Do not use this it. It has locked me out with no warning, no time frame as to when I can come back, no constructive replies when asked if I could provide any information of any sort. They won’t reply anything that is not copy-pasted over and over again to every question. Forget about it, if it sounds too good to be true it’s Revolut and their crappy promises. Worst customer service, probably straight up a scam.

title: Doesn’t work in US
text:
I signed up about a month ago and have been stuck on their waitlist ever since - my spot has not moved at all. I’ve tried to contact the company but could not even find contact details- they are not listed on their website and the app only shows my waitlist position. Trying to reach out through their online community has also been without result - the have basically refused to publish my post. 
Bottom line just stay away from this and look for other alternatives that offer similar features and no fees.

title: App is FUBAR
text: US-based iPhone user running on latest versions of iOS and Revolut. The app is barely functional that I no longer feel comfortable using it. 1) App asks for my Social Securitty Number every time it is launched. 2) Debit card verification process doesn't work. 3) Revtag can't be saved after changing even though it is available. 4) Passcode for app-based platform suddenly doesn't work on web-based platform. I wonder if the option to delete my account is still functional...

title: SLOW AND BUGGY
text: can’t change my tag… says unknown error and two i don’t think they should be displaying ppls full legal name to the world, middle included. idc if they have it, but i didn’t type my middle name for it to be displayed. they pulled it off my license and added it. they also changed my pin to when i had the app before about 5 min after downloading. super buggy. like… if i uninstalled and reinstalled, how do you still have my previous pin from a closed acct?! super sus. the whole app gives me sus vibes.

title: Can’t log into app anymore
text: For some reason I’ve been logged out of the app, and ever since I’m no longer able to log in. I am prompted to an insert my phone number page, but then asks me to set a passcode and returns a’ something went wrong error’. This is really bad, my money are stuck into an account I can’t get in.

title: Useless?
text: Enrolled in Revolut a few days ago. But is close to completely useless. Could only transfer a total of $20 in recent days. Linked bank account and even that modest amount of $200 did not make it to the Revolut app yet. I am pretty disappointed about the extremely limited usability - and probably worst they were not upfront about this in their big print (there probably is some fine print outlining their approach). Not recommended.

title: Best bank ever!
text: Revolut is the best and the most affordable bank I have ever used. I don’t use credit cards so the debit card they offer is perfect. Very easy to use and strikingly modern. I have had some issues but they have been instantly resolved with the online customer service agents.

title: Trash company, trash customer service
text: I have been trying to get a transfer through to pay my rent for over three weeks now. You cannot get in contact with anyone who knows what they are talking about. All you can do is chat with some frontline dumb worker that has no idea what is going on. They keep dragging me on claiming “someone is working on it” every day with no meaningful updates. I eventually had to take my business elsewhere. NEVER use this company if you want your money in trusted hands.

title: Sign up process minor bug
text:
Bug in sign up process (at least for me), as a US resident havent started using the app yet.

Writing a review as others have pointed out they provide no other mechanism for support outside of the app.

When signing up to be in he queue it uses your phone number, assign a PIn and then asks for email.  When it asked for an email, I switched apps to save my PIN somewhere and switched back to Revolut.  It was then stuck where it would ask for a PIN and hang there.  Deleting the app and reinstalling was a fix.

Ideally it would be nice to have some other means to query support.  Also it would be good that if the app is switched, it would maintain the state of the login process.

I’ll update the review when I can use the app

title: Terrible customer service system
text: I’ve been trying to get my account verified for months on end. Only way to communicate with someone is through the Revolut app with live chat. Which is the most useless feature every given the fact you get instantly deactivated if you’re identity can’t be verified disconnecting you from the chat. No one’s been able to help the all say the same thing saying it’s gonna be a couple days then never get back with anything.

title: Horrible customer service and false advertising
text: Revolut was advertising $40 for opening a new account and referring a friend. I was excited at the awesome deal and referred a friend who was also looking for an account. I referred a friend based off that $40 for both of us. I was never credited the money. Even worse when I contacted customer service they told me that they didn’t see the offer on my account and they couldn’t fix it for her or I. This was refused all the way up the chain. Beware of false advertising!

title: Support is bad
text: It’s a rabbit hole, it takes weeks to for anything where support is involved. The only available option is “chat”. But it’s not a chat, it’s - we write you when we feel like it and if you don’t respond (because maybe you’re still asleep on Sunday morning), it’s not our problem. Maybe a premium support is better, but honestly, I have no desire to give this company my money. There are a lot of good competitors who can provide support if they need to authorize my account.

title: Great app, easy currency exchange and transfers
text: Works great, app is user-friendly and well organized. Fees for international transfers are reasonable and you get $1000 of free currency exchanges per month with the free plan. Works great for what I need it for with minimal fees. Paid plans are also available with many additional benefits.

title: Amazing app and bank!!
text: This is so much better for paying overseas wedding fees than having to do a wire transfer and paying $35 each payment. This app makes it so much easier for me to pay my deposits. It is so east to use and I highly recommend this app to anyone!!

title: Froze all my funds
text: DO NOT USE! They have frozen tens of thousands of €/$ for unclear reasons. They won’t accept any of the income verification I’ve provided. They keep asking for more and more private financial and personal information that has nothing to do with my account there. Appears to be some type of data mining scam. Now won’t let me transfer funds back to the domestic bank account the funds originally came from. No end in sight and no idea when I’ll have access to my money. A complete nightmare.

title: Great- but no customer service
text: I wish there was a better way to reach someone. I’ve had a problem and need someone to help me with my specific problem that has no answer online. But the chat does not work well. I wish there was a better way to communicate with a human.

title: Taking your info and holding your money while spreading propaganda
text:
They be asking you to take a selfie everytime you log in on new device. Then they be suspending your cards randomly, then be asking you to verify by messaging a selfie holding your card, does this app think it’s social media or what? 

App requires you to setup a password every time you log in??? 

I wasn’t gonna msg them anymore selfies and I asked them for a refund and it’s been three days and all they do is msg me propaganda, “just take a selfie with your card!!” Like no just msg me the money.

title: Super helpful!
text: This app is great and the card is great. It’s pretty self explanatory and it’s super easy to use. I paid extra for a rose gold card but it’s worth it. I’m traveling all over Europe and the card has worked everywhere with no issues and when I run out of money I can get some transferred within seconds

title: Worst customer service experience in my life
text: Wait before giving any money to Revolut. I have been now stuck 3 times over 6 months with their customer service: each time it took weeks (literally weeks!) to solve the same basic source of funds issue and whilst you wait for someone to answer you are completely stuck and have no way to raise your concern as your help function is stuck in “search for an available agent” mode for weeks at the time. Revolut should definitely loose their license.

title: Worst customer service
text: There is a government regulation for them to get documents to deposit my paycheck. I have messaged them way too many times. I get it is a regulation but they don’t respond and I still haven’t my money. They only contact thru messages and do not have a contact phone number. The agents will not do anything for you but tell me that it could take 48 hours to advise me what they need. Run Run away, go to a real bank because if you sign up with them you will regret it.

title: Banned my account without cause or explanation
text: I really loved using Revolut while I had it but I am giving it a one star review because they blocked my account without any cause and without any explanation. I contacted them several times and offered them any verification document that they required in order to unban my account, but they still offered no explanation for why they banned my account. There was no fraudulent activity on my card and I was using it completely normally in my travels.

title: Marketing messages should be off by default!
text:
As much as admire Revolut and their success I was annoyed at the marketing push notifications and the fact that I had to dig into the settings and figure out it was under privacy. At leas there was a toggle so I’m only docking them two stars this time.

I’m already a customer so why push your luck by trying to shove stuff down my throat!

title: Security
text: Giving one of my exceptionally rare reviews simply to say that Revolut has some feature for flagging when you may be getting scammed, and they saved me from losing €1300 that I don’t have to spare right now. Earned significant customer loyalty from me for that.

title: Total trash
text: I must say this app has also did me dirty do not download you will get your money ripped off and there won’t be any response when they’re ready they swindle me out of money, and when I tried to cancel my account, I wasn’t able to because they had pending transactions that they were trying to get after the fact that there was no money left to take. I am very anxious with my personal information out there , so bottom line it’s a scam. Be careful.

title: Great fin tech app. Good for online payments and bank deposits
text: I use many functions, I issued cards for my underaged kids, I use burning virtual cards to avoid unwanted renewals and secure online payments, I deposit funds to bank accounts and I refill instantly with apple pay with no commissions.

title: Won’t explain or unrestrict my brand new account
text: I opened an account so I could easily send family in Ireland money. My account was restricted as soon as I funded it and continues to be restricted without explanation or resolution. Beginning to think this is a giant SCAM and my money has been stolen. The chat feature has failed to resolve the situation and none of the chats explain why the restriction, how to get it removed, or how I get my money.  Avoid this app!!!! No such problems with other payment apps.

title: Lifesaver
text: I’ve been traveling with my card and I got to say, This is a life saver. It doesn’t have a direct link to your bank so if scammers get your info ( which is highly unlikely) your bank will not be affected. It is very safe and transactions are practically free and super fast. I love this app so much!!

title: Absolutely no customer support
text: Aside from the better fees for international travel, trying to get help on this app is impossible. Forget about the 2 to 3 business days for transfers from your bank account to your revolut Account. I’m still waiting and it’s six days. I had to actually make a small deposit from my bank for about $30 and use the card before I was able to add a larger transfer from my bank account. No idea how to get customer support!!

title: Scheduled Transfer from a Volt
text:
Hi there
A big fan of this app and service. Thanks to all the team.
Wondering though, it would be really nice to be able to adjust a volt that I have dedicated to specific payment, as a source to a scheduled payment. This way organizing repayments would be be even more clean and smart. What you guys say about it?
Cheers

title: Card keeps declining / No customer support
text:
My card keep constantly declining even though I have money on it and don’t have any limits on the card. This is really annoying because their phone support is basically an automated robot that keeps saying same things over and over.

And their chat within the app is only available to premium members who pay monthly subscription. 

Stick with your own travel cards to save yourself some hussle.
